service.title: SOLUTIONS FOR CONSTRUCTING AND DEVELOPING HEALTHCARE FACILITIES

about.title: Vietnamese Dream of Aspiration
about.description: CMED is a startup project pursuing the mission of providing solutions for constructing and developing private healthcare models to optimize time and human resources for businesses. Above all, we understand the difficulties of laying the first bricks to build a private healthcare business and the shortcomings that the healthcare system in Vietnam faces. CMED desires to lend a helping hand alongside businesses in building enterprises with solutions regarding operations, personnel, technology, and construction, implementing communication strategies.

article.title: Aspiration to Expand into the Vast Sea
article.article2: CMED was founded in 2022 by experienced consultants and doctors with profound understanding of the healthcare sector - a business field with its own conditions and specificities. We understand that establishing and operating an efficient healthcare facility is not easy. Private healthcare businesses face difficulties in establishment, personnel management, operation, and application of digital transformation solutions. CMED aims not only to be a consulting unit providing comprehensive solutions but also to accompany businesses until the solutions succeed.
article.article3: Our aspiration is tied to every customer, every strategic partner, and the network of talented personnel, which serves as inspiration and strength for us to work together creatively, continuously improving to better serve customers every day. Currently, we are closely collaborating with customers, whether it's constructing new healthcare facilities, expanding the scope of specialized activities, or improving the operations of existing healthcare facilities. We aim to support the establishment and operation of healthcare facilities effectively, narrowing the gap between patients and quality healthcare services, as well as the gap between healthcare services in Vietnam and the world. CMED chooses to develop with a proactive mindset, pioneering in the healthcare consulting field, with a vision to create sustainable and humane values for the overall development of the healthcare industry in Vietnam.

testimonials.content1: Above all, we understand the difficulties of laying the first bricks to build a private healthcare business and the shortcomings that the healthcare system in Vietnam faces. CMED desires to lend a helping hand alongside businesses in building enterprises with solutions regarding operations, personnel, technology, and construction, implementing communication strategies.
testimonials.content2: Above all, we understand the difficulties of laying the first bricks to build a private healthcare business and the shortcomings that the healthcare system in Vietnam faces. CMED desires to lend a helping hand alongside businesses in building enterprises with solutions regarding operations, personnel, technology, and construction, implementing communication strategies.

vision.content1: With a team of experienced, reputable experts operating in the Law and Healthcare sectors, CMED provides customers with comprehensive consulting services on holistic solutions, legal matters, and personnel in the private healthcare sector, especially for businesses with foreign investment. We confidently deliver perfect service quality to customers. CMED will become the leading consulting company in the healthcare sector domestically and aim to be on par with the Southeast Asian region.
vision.content2: Our mission is to collaborate with hospitals, clinics, and businesses for sustainable development in the current healthcare landscape. CMED wishes to contribute its efforts to the development of infrastructure and architecture in the healthcare system of Vietnam.

personnel.title: Personnel
personnel.description: A great mission requires TALENTED PERSONNEL with the desire to bring real value to the healthcare business. CMED gathers a team of experts with many years of experience in the healthcare field.

banner.title: Services
banner.description: By leveraging our experience and abilities, we will actualize the sustainable development of the "Modern Medical City".

article.content-1: From addressing the daily challenges hospitals face to initiating new hospital projects or improving existing ones, we have solutions for all. CMED assists businesses with various plans to enhance management, restructure, start new ventures, etc., to implementing those plans. We aim to create hospitals that patients and healthcare workers choose.
article.content-2: Our experienced consultants provide reliable support for businesses considering opening a new nursing home right from the planning stage. While the elderly population will increase in the future, currently there are few nursing homes, and people's habits of using nursing services are limited. Therefore, careful consideration, including market research, is needed before starting a new business. Our services not only support entrepreneurship but also provide comprehensive assistance, including understanding the vision that business owners want to achieve, building plans to ensure stable management even after operation, and recruitment support.
article.content-3: We support the establishment and operation of clinics by maximizing the skills acquired towards both ideals and practicality. We flexibly respond to various types of clinics with different specialties. We listen to the ideas and experiences of doctors, build a model suitable for medical operations, and provide effective business support based on customer data and market research. We provide support tailored to the needs of each business.
article.content-4: We provide consulting services from opening specialty clinics to operational support. We can help solve problems at different stages of specialty clinics. Operating a clinic is becoming increasingly difficult due to the fiercely competitive private healthcare environment. With the motto 'Success in opening and operating clinics will contribute to the overall success of the national healthcare system,' we support businesses in maintaining clinics that adapt to societal changes and continue to meet the healthcare needs of the people.

target.header: Mission to Build the Ideal Health City
target.content: With the rapid changes in modern life, the desire to build an ideal healthcare service facility for healthcare professionals and patients is becoming increasingly urgent. However, there is still a shortage of healthcare facilities, and existing facilities have many issues to overcome. Cmed has a mission to be a strong arm accompanying healthcare businesses in the process of construction and development. We call this the mission to build a 'Modern Health City.' Cmed aims to be a trusted partner for anyone pursuing this goal. Initially, we have strengths in working at both state-owned and private healthcare facilities. We have implemented and operated numerous clinic projects in Vietnam and internationally. By leveraging our experience and capabilities, we will realize the sustainable development of the 'Modern Health City.' Like pioneers in building the 'City,' we sow seeds, nurture, and shape healthcare facilities for your ideas. With a pioneering spirit, we strive for innovation and value creation alongside individuals and businesses operating in the healthcare sector. 'For a modern health city' is what CMED aims for.

reason1.title: High Experience and Expertise
reason1.content: Through the journey of accompanying and developing alongside hospitals and clinics, Cmed has accumulated practical experience along with a highly skilled team of experts.

reason2.title: Quality and Prestige
reason2.content: Cmed takes pride in being a leading provider in Vietnam offering services for the establishment and operation of practical healthcare solutions in collaboration with healthcare facilities. Our commitment to service quality is our foremost guiding principle.

reason3.title: Professional staff team
reason3.content: With the aspiration to bring tangible value to healthcare businesses, Cmed gathers a team of experts with years of experience in the field of healthcare.

terms4.title: ISSUES RELATED TO LEGAL PROVISIONS:
terms4.terms4.1: Sakura Medical & Dental Clinic was officially established and put into operation since March 2014, Sakura General Clinic is the address for health care and treatment of health problems for the Japanese community living, working, and traveling in Hanoi.
terms4.terms4.2: Sakura General Clinic is built to become a model Japanese healthcare facility in Vietnam, not only in service style, environment but also in the quality of healthcare services. With a view overlooking West Lake and a cool, friendly space imbued with Japanese style, Sakura gives you a sense of peace like a miniature Japan in bustling, crowded Hanoi.

terms4.3.content: Through nearly 10 years of construction and development, the personnel at Cmed have accompanied in many operating categories of the clinic:
terms4.3.c: Consulting and handling legal issues Consulting and business development
